name: Weight Loss
description: Being fit and living healthy is what I know and love. Fitness has always been a part of my life. I grew up in a fit family—my dad ran marathons, we had a home gym, and my parents always had gym memberships.

name: Fit & Healthy
description: Our double room comfort is approx. 20m² large. The rooms are functional but nevertheless cozy and charmingly furnished rooms. All rooms have a balcony with stunning mountain views.

name: Muscle Building
description: Modern-alpine or new country house-style superior double rooms? Please tell us your taste and we will do our utmost to provide you your favorite room. Whoever first books first chooses
